Eyes of a Nomad
Home Portfolio Work with Me Contact

Boudoir Rachel

fashion

A shoot just for the love of shooting, my good friend @rachel_bowler_ & I hunted for a unique location to showcase the most beautiful hand made dresses. Each dress is covered in thousands of individual, hand sewn sequence, making for a really special & unique dress to shoot. We wanted to pair that uniqueness with the vastness of a volcanic lava field.
